translation.PlenoScreen: Glad you're perfect. Can't get any better!
translation.FelizScreen: Let's be happy because it's good for your health.
translation.NeutroScreen: I'm not happy or sad, there is no definition. I'm just living for no reason.
translation.TristeScreen: Don't be sad, everything will get better.
translation.PessimoScreen: Nobody can be strong all the time.
translation.FeedbackPositivo: Share your happiness with us. Click bellow to send us a message.
translation.FeedbackNegativo: Can we help you with something? Send us a message by clicking bellow, or go back to the main screen.
